home.title: Bio
home.description: Software Engineer & Technical Leader | 15+ Years Building Scalable Solutions | Mobile Apps, Cloud Architecture, API Design
home.intro1: I'm JP Melanson, a <mark>software engineer and technical leader</mark> with over <mark>15 years</mark> of experience delivering scalable digital solutions that drive business results. I've architected and built applications used by thousands of users, reduced operational costs by up to <mark>60% through strategic migrations</mark>, and led technical initiatives at companies ranging from startups to Fortune 500 enterprises.
home.intro2: My expertise spans the <mark>full software development lifecycle</mark>, with proven success in <mark>mobile application development</mark>, <mark>cloud architecture</mark>, and <mark>API design</mark>. I specialize in transforming business requirements into high-performance applications that scale efficiently and deliver measurable value.
home.intro3: What sets me apart is my ability to <mark>bridge Product, UX, and Engineering</mark> disciplines. I work directly with stakeholders to understand business objectives, then architect solutions that balance technical excellence with user needs and market demands. This collaborative, outcome-driven approach has consistently delivered projects on time and exceeded expectations.
home.intro4: I build modern applications using industry-leading technologies: <mark>Next.js</mark>, <mark>React</mark>, <mark>React Native</mark>, and <mark>TypeScript</mark> for front-end development; <mark>Postgres</mark>, <mark>TypeScript</mark>, <mark>Rails</mark>, and <mark>Go</mark> for robust backends. I continuously invest in emerging technologies, currently exploring <mark>Rust</mark> for systems-level performance.
home.intro5: I provide <mark>technical leadership and consulting services</mark> to small and medium-sized organizations in technology, real estate, finance, and Bitcoin. Whether you need to build a product from scratch, optimize existing systems, or establish technical best practices, I deliver solutions that align with your business goals.
